targets.expr: avg(1 - node_filesystem_avail_bytes {mountpoint="/"} / node_filesystem_size_bytes{mountpoint="/"}) by (instance) * 100 * on(instance) group_left(nodename, hostname) node_host_name{hostname=~"$node"}

sum(((node_filesystem_size_bytes {job="node-exporter", instance=~".*9100", device=~"/dev/.*", mountpoint!~"/var/.*|/tmp/.*", fstype="ext4"} * on(instance) group_left nvidia_smi_on) > 0) * on(instance) group_left(nodename, hostname) node_host_name{hostname=~"$node"}) by (hostname, mountpoint)

sum(node_filesystem_avail_bytes / ((node_filesystem_size_bytes {job="node-exporter", instance=~".*9100", device=~"/dev/.*", mountpoint!~"/var/.*|/tmp/.*", fstype="ext4"} * on(instance) group_left nvidia_smi_on) > 0) * on(instance) group_left(nodename, hostname) node_host_name{hostname=~"$node"}) by (hostname, mountpoint)

label_replace(clamp(node_filesystem_size_bytes{device=~"/dev/.*", mountpoint!~"/var/lib/docker/aufs|/tmp/.*", fstype="ext4"}, 1, 1), 'devicepath', '$1', 'device', '(.*)') * on (devicepath, instance) group_left(hostname) (label_replace(rate(node_disk_read_bytes_total[$interval]), 'devicepath', '/dev/$1', 'device', '(.*)') * on(instance) group_left(nodename, hostname) node_host_name{hostname=~"$node"})

label_replace(clamp(node_filesystem_size_bytes{device=~"/dev/.*", mountpoint!~"/var/lib/docker/aufs|/tmp/.*", fstype="ext4"}, 1, 1), 'devicepath', '$1', 'device', '(.*)') * on (devicepath, instance) group_left(hostname) (label_replace(rate(node_disk_written_bytes_total[$interval]), 'devicepath', '/dev/$1', 'device', '(.*)') * on(instance) group_left(nodename, hostname) node_host_name{hostname=~"$node"})
